post_title: What is the most expensive hotel in monaco?

comments.author: Northern_Lights_2
comments.body: Probably the Hotel de Paris or the Hermitage.

comments.author: karencalab
comments.body: Ohh and the best car? Lol

comments.author: Ok_Wonder_526
comments.body: See or stay? Hotel de paris

comments.author: WasteLab
comments.body: Do u all even live here ? Forget hotel de paris its a shit hole with old rooms and dirty pillows . Best hotel is Metropole

comments.author: haroldhecuba88
comments.body: These two. We prefer Hermitage, a bit more “old world” and low key. Both are equally luxurious.

comments.author: alexkander45031
comments.body: I think the Citroën Ami is best for Monaco. I heard it drifts around curves very safe and nicely

comments.author: McLarenFan0481
comments.body: I mean it says "I'm in Monaco with friends and we want to see the most expensive hotel in the city," so it doesn't look like they're claiming to live here.

comments.author: Vast_Decision3680
comments.body: "old rooms", it was fully renovated few years ago...

comments.author: Northern_Lights_2
comments.body: If you’re facing the casino from the casino gardens they’re both on your right.  Hotel de Paris is on the square, hermitage more behind it.
